{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Xirrus |model=XR-1000H Series |revision=(XR-1230H) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/31/2013 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=SK6-XR1000H, SK6-XR520 |ic_id=5428A-XR1000H |pwr_v=56 |pwr_amp=0.35 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5020 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=M29W160ET |fla1_num= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT47H128M8CF-25E |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9390 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=SMA,N-Female |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9390 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi2_ant_conn=SMA,N-Female |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=outdoor |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=10.0.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:0F:7D |oui_eth=00:0F:7D }} [http://www.xirrus.com/Products/Wireless-Arrays/XR-Series/XR-1000H Product page]
[http://www.xirrus.com/cdn/pdf/datasheet_xr1000h Datasheet] :Two sub-models: XR-1130H (one wireless module) and XR-1230H (two wireless modules) Per FCC photos, this device is using... *''Cavium'' [http://www.cavium.com/new/Table.html#Octeonplus OCTEON Plus] SoC *''STMicroelectronics'' M29W160ET 16Mbit (2MB) Flash (??, external main storage?) *4x ''Micron'' [http://www.micron.com/parts/dram/ddr2-sdram/mt47h128m8cf-25e?matpart={B39D8F95-4EA6-447D-B5B0-05AA84EA9CB8} MT47H128M8CF-25E:H] (IVH12 [http://www.micron.com/products/support/fbga?fbga=D9LHQ D9LHQ]) *''Broadcom'' GbE PHY (in BGA packaging). Default credentials are per the FCC manual... and may not be accurate.
